name: Royal Bridge
description:
Game created solo by @mahjoub_gamedev in 48h for the GMTK game jam 2021!

Goal

Collect tree in order to build all boards between your King & your Queen, while protecting them from Pirates attacks! 
Talk to them to buy new features! 

Description

As an adventurer, you have been assigned an important mission: create a bridge between you King & your Queen.
For that, you will need to explore and be lost in order to collect resources... but do not forget to protect them!

As generous people, you King &  your Queen are selling you some special features for helping you on your journey, go talk to them in order to check out that! Good Luck!

Controls

- Keyboard arrows for moving
- Left Click for shooting
- Right Click for building boards
